name: Super Bunny Hop
description:
Super Bunny Hop

Take control of the bunny and hop as high as you can by hopping on platforms, avoiding obstacles and collecting items.

Features:
• Controls: Tilt your device using the accelerometer or touch the left/right side of the screen to move the bunny.

• Platforms: Normal, Small, Broken and Moving
• Items: Jetpack
• Objects: Spring and Spikes

• View all scores in the Leaderboard
• Many achievements to collect

• View all your stats
• Share screenshot with your friends!


Get the game now for free and see how high you can hop!

Want to play now? (current state: Closed-Alpha, Android only)

If you are interested in joining closed testing, join the google+ community and click on the Opt-in for testing (Android) link to the left under about community.

https://plus.google.com/communities/114577904219591954425?sqinv=SVBOY2gtVm4xY0JU...

When will it move out of closed testing?

Open-Beta will be available in the next few months. I cannot give an exact date as of yet.

Many thanks for checking out this project,
Jack
